propiedad: Casa Brisa Dulce - Casa en venta en Signature Estates, Bahia de Banderas
ubicacion: Punta de Mita, Bah√≠a de Banderas, Nayarit
descripcion: Casa en Venta en Signature Estates, Bahia de Banderas, Nayarit :  Casa Brisa Dulce, situated on nearly 1 acre and designed by noted architect Jaime Barba, is a breathtaking estate sitting directly on the most coveted beach inside the Punta Mita gates. Enjoy unobstructed views of the Pacific Ocean and island hole 3B of the Pacifico Golf Course. Swim in the heated pool or in the ocean directly in front of the house or lounge in the spacious hot tub. The house is part of the guarded Signature Estates subdivision and has its own gated entry as well.The estate, completed in 2006 and meticulously kept up to date since then, was built for the busy executive and a large family who enjoy both entertaining and quiet time. The estate is fully stocked with all the modern conveniences. Enjoy the kayaks, paddle boards, boogie boards, mountain bikes, fishing equipment, snorkel gear, and ping pong table plus all the resort amenities that Punta Mita has to offer.Ideal for entertaining or preparing meals for the family, Casa Brisa Dulce contains a gourmet kitchen with a walk-in refrigerator and a spacious living and dining ‚Äúgreat room‚Äù which opens up to the pool and ocean. Off of the dining room is a covered outdoor breakfast dining patio with views of the ocean. The estate is fully equipped with high-speed internet, a Sonos entertainment system, and internet-enabled televisions. Two family rooms allow ample space for fun and a quiet library with its full bath provides a welcome quiet place to relax.The estate comfortably sleeps up to 16 people in 6 bedrooms, one apartment, and one swing library/bedroom. It contains 8 full bathrooms and 2 half-baths, one of which is a dedicated staff bath in the garage. Casa Brisa Dulce has 2 study/offices, complete with computers and printers. The master study includes a wet bar and double window that opens to the sea, providing stunning views in a private office setting.Importantly, as a resident of the Signature Estates, residents and their guests enjoy full access to the Four Season Hotel, a simple 200-yard walk down the beach or a short golf cart ride away. In addition, membership to the Punta Mita golf and beach clubs will allow residents access to all resort amenities, including the Pacifico Beach Club located right next door.____________________________Sol y Luna Realty se pone a sus ordenes en servicios de Bienes Raices en Puerto Vallarta y Riviera Nayarit, ofrecemos:Casas en Venta en Signature Estates Bahia de The integration of high-end finishes and custom-made furnishings creates a sophisticated yet welcoming atmosphere, perfect for both relaxation and entertainment.Casa XARI offers an unparalleled lifestyle, combining the tranquility of oceanfront living with the luxury of an extraordinarily designed and fully equipped modern villa.FEATURESSuites: Two incredible primary suites with large walk-in closets, spacious spa-inspired ensuite baths, generous and comfortable separate seating areas, one featuring direct terrace access with truly amazing ocean views and the second offering tropical views of the lush jungle surroundings. Stunning woodwork and custom ceilings creating a soothing retreat that organically complements the natural setting.6 spacious bedrooms with luxurious finishes, four of those offering stunning ocean views.Bathrooms: 12 full bathrooms, including one on the terrace for easy convenience and a half bath for visitors, equipped with Hansgrohe faucets, beautiful custom woodwork and cabinetry throughout, and thoughtful details like double sinks.Infinity Pool: Two sparkling infinity pools that blend seamlessly with the horizon.Lot Area: 23,993 sq ft (2,229 m¬≤) of prime oceanfront land.Construction Area: 24,111 sq ft (2,240 m¬≤) of meticulously crafted living space.Staff Rooms: 2 dedicated staff rooms.Elevator and Covered Parking Area30 meters of direct beach access creating an unforgettable retreat of your own in paradise.FINISHES AND AMENITIESWindows: Spanish double-glazed windows for superior insulation and tranquility.Utilities: Equipped with a power plant, whole-house water filter, whole-house internet network, and washers, dryer, and industrial iron.Comfort: Air conditioning in all areas, pool heater and cooler, and solar energy for eco-friendly living.Interior: Solid parota wood carpentry, an Italian kitchen, custom-made furniture, and Tempur mattresses.Technology: Standard and emergency satellite internet, Lutron system, and automated irrigation.Water Management: A 120,000-liter cistern and water treatment plant.Additional Features: Elevator, switchboard, and Italian-designed exterior furniture.This home of distinction is sold turnkey, complete with full luxury furnishings and decor pieces that create a peaceful sanctuary designed both for ultimate comfort as well as entertaining and hosting.
